title: Facebook Fights: Don't put your pyramid schemes on the community page
description: A woman writes about losing weight on a community Facebook page which is great but it also involved a multi-leveling marketing scheme, and someone else was not happy about that.
itunes:summary: A woman writes about losing weight on a community Facebook page which is great but it also involved a multi-leveling marketing scheme, and someone else was not happy about that.
